laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially elevated CRP (7.18 mg/dL, normal values: < 0.5 mg/dL). On the 6th day, CRP further increased to 15.5 mg/dL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 7.18 mg/dL to 15.5 mg/dL over 6 days.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for both CMV IgM and IgG with low IgG avidity test (< 10%).
Strongly positive for CMV DNA (40,917 iu/mL, positive > 178 iu/mL).
Negative for SARS-CoV-2, Influenza virus antigen, and RSV antigen.
Not indicative of autoimmune disorder (ANA, p-ANCA, ASMA, RF, complement system and control for the major immunoglobulin classes).
